Package org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.bool

Class BoolExp<T>

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.bool.BoolExp<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of atomic expressions
Direct Known Subclasses:
BoolAtomic, BoolBinary, BoolNeg, BoolTrue
public abstract class BoolExp<T>
extends java.lang.Object
This is an abstract class for Boolean expressions.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
